user_query: I want to make informed investment decisions. Can you provide me with the top gainers and top losers? Additionally, I would like to know the investment strategy for the ETF with security ID F00000O2CG.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top gainers in the stock market to identify potential investment opportunities.
Fetch the top losers in the stock market to assess risks in current investments.
Retrieve the investment strategy details for the ETF with security ID F00000O2CG.
